name: Jack_(South_Dakota)
text:
Jack (South Dakota)
You may be looking for John Justice Wheeler.
Jack was a mechanic for Dale Cooper's doppelganger.
Biography
Jack had dinner with Cooper, Ray Monroe, and Darya, eagerly eating three helpings.
He later closed up a garage containing Cooper's car and gave him a new one. Cooper began to rub Jack's face and killed him after discovering that he wired the car.
